sqlList.sql: SELECT lm.ID, lm.ID AS platformID,lm.platform_code AS platformcode,lm.platform_name AS platformnm, lm.status AS ONLINESTATUS, (CASE lm.status WHEN '0' THEN '下线' WHEN '1' THEN '上线' ELSE '' END ) as ONLINEDIS, lm.create_time AS CDTIME, lm.update_time AS UDTIME from t_lm_b_platform lm where ((:PLATFORMNAME IS NULL) OR (lm.platform_name LIKE '%'||:PLATFORMNAME||'%')) AND ((:ONLINESTATUS IS NULL) OR (lm.status=:ONLINESTATUS)) AND ((:StartDTime IS NULL) OR (to_date(:StartDTime, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= lm.create_time)) AND ((:EndDTime IS NULL) OR (lm.create_time <= to_date(:EndDTime, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) ORDER BY lm.ID DESC
select lm.platform_code AS platformCODE,lm.platform_name AS platformNM from t_lm_b_platform lm where (lm.platform_code <> :PLATFORMCODE) AND (lm.platform_name = :PLATFORMNM)
select lm.platform_code AS platformCODE,lm.platform_name AS platformNM from t_lm_b_platform lm where (lm.platform_code = :PLATFORMCODE) OR (lm.platform_name = :PLATFORMNM)
INSERT INTO t_lm_b_platform(ID, platform_code, platform_name, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (:ID, :PLATFORMCODE, :PLATFORMNM, '0' ,SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
UPDATE t_lm_b_platform SET platform_name=:PLATFORMNM,status=:ONLINESTATUS, update_time=SYSDATE WHERE platform_code=:ID
